data.name: HENTAI: NAZI GIRL
data.detailed_description:
HENTAI: NAZI GIRL is a satirical 3rd person shooter where you play as a sexy naked girl. You will have to destroy the enemies, evil and dangerous, also go to their base, where you need to kill everyone (unexpectedly, right?), you need to collect propaganda posters (and they contain jokes with elements of black humor, be sure to read it). After collecting all the propaganda posters, you need to find the hidden invitation to the club. And then a new big enemy will appear and you will be allowed to destroy the eyes lying on the ground, which indicate a connection with the enemy.

Game Features:
  • Short but fun gameplay
  • Various weapons
  • sexy character
  • Evil opponents with their own humor
  • Black humor propaganda posters
  • Location with hidden Easter eggs
  • Scary, big and angry boss with interesting jokes on it

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB +
  • Storage: 740 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

content_descriptors.notes: The game features cartoonish blood and murder, also cartoonish nudity
